asset.author: skisdotcom
asset.hookText:
http://www.skis.com/Nordica-Firearrow-84-Pro-Skis-with-N-Pro-Evo-Bindings-2015/352766P,default,pd.html

The Nordica Firearrow 84 Pro is a lightning quick ski from edge to edge for strong advanced to expert skiers. The EVO Binding Plate is a powerful integrated system that is attached to the sidewall of the ski that will give you excellent power transmission over an 84mm waist, and strong turns. The Firearrow 84 Pro has EVO Energy 2 Carbon Construction that has a damp and stable feeling at fast and very fast speeds, but does not add extra weight to the ski. Nordica's Rapid Race Profile combined with Frontside camRock has an aggressive tip shape that will quickly engage the sidecut in the beginning of your turns. A smaller sidecut in the tip lets your skis track straighter on the snow that is ultra fast, and stable. If you want a powerful carving ski that will be very fast edge to edge, and stable the Nordica Firearrow 84 will put a smile on your face as you fly by other skiers on the mountain.
